column1: So how strong is the #Impeachment case against #DonaldTrump? Very. Watch my segment with @ABC7NY @billritter7 where we discuss the historic vote & what happens next.   https://t.co/0cp9wnWMFs

Unacceptable & further proof of the failures of the Trump Administration & local mismanagement of the crisis in #PuertoRico. Full transparency is needed and accountability must be required of all officials of how aid is managed and distributed to individuals and families in need. https://t.co/hlaFhXl0Iz

During yesterday's @HouseForeign hearing I addressed my efforts to strengthen security throughout Mexico and Central America. Increasing funding for the Caribbean Basin Security Initiative (CBSI) will help fight illicit drug trafficking & narcotics that is fueling U.S. addiction https://t.co/doQF3RHwFP
https://t.co/AWd9ANxurB
https://t.co/aXNDjB47Yt
This is a critical time for our brothers and sisters in #PuertoRico and the administration’s decision to withhold relief funds was reckless and dangerous.
And I will remain personally involved as we track developments moving forward to ensure that the funds responsibly and expeditiously reach survivors.
I am committed to helping #PuertoRico as the island rebuilds its critical infrastructure housing and public buildings and to helping families get their lives back on track.

#PuertoRico will rebuild & New Yorkers will continue to be there every step of the way.  After 2 years the Trump Administration’s decision to release $8B in disaster relief funding to Puerto Rico is inexcusable & such a delay never should have happened. https://t.co/y3mPd30vCY

This particular case is shameful! Such actions are unacceptable & should never be tolerated. We still have more work to do which is why I'm a proud original cosponsor of @RepJerryNadler’s bipartisan Pregnant Workers Fairness Act to help improve protections for pregnant workers.

Despite existing protections pregnant workers in the U.S. still face workplace discrimination across industry and state. Women of color and immigrants may be at particular risk. We have long witnessed #Eulen’s poor treatment of their workers and women in particular. https://t.co/7tmmJP0iW4

Tras el terremoto de magnitud 6.4 de esta mañana y el sismo que afectó a la isla a principios de esta semana Puerto Rico necesita el respaldo total de la Administración Trump para ayudar a la isla a recuperarse de una vez por todas.  https://t.co/kN2No1tj0h
Si bien las oraciones son de apoyo y verdaderamente reconfortantes los ciudadanos estadounidenses de #PuertoRico necesitan acción.
La Administración Trump ha fallado en abordar este desastre humanitario en #PuertoRico y ha mal administrado consistentemente los recursos necesarios para reconstruir la isla.

In the wake of this morning’s 6.4 magnitude earthquake and the quake that affected the island earlier this week #PuertoRico needs the full support of the Trump administration to help the island recover once and for all.  https://t.co/kN2No1tj0h
The Trump Administration has failed to address this humanitarian disaster in #PuertoRico and has consistently mismanaged the resources needed to rebuild the island.

Today I issued the following statement on the killing of #QasemSoleimani the commander of Iran’s notorious Quds Force.  https://t.co/kUs6BSwa3v https://t.co/GIVXuhzis1

My primary concern with the administration’s reckless escalation is for the safety of U.S. service members diplomats personnel and our allies in the region who are now at heightened risk of aggressive Iranian retaliation.
The various strikes conducted over the last week by the administration culminating with the escalation in last night’s targeted killing of #QasemSoleimani appear to be part of this ad hoc approach.
The Trump Administration has continuously shown a lack of preparedness or a coherent strategy regarding #Iran and the entire Middle East.

Our community! Our voice! Join us tomorrow at 8:30am for a press conference at the Inwood Public Library located at 4790 Broadway NY #NY13   Justice Verna Saunders’ decision in favor of Northern Manhattan is Not For Sale is a win for Inwood and for the people of New York City! https://t.co/1kSYbtoC4W
